data.name: Banner of the Maid - Miss Elisa's Journal
data.detailed_description:
As the riot in Paris came to the end,People wants to know the truth behind that series of things.Our brave journalist Miss Elisa decide to take a risk to solve the mysteries around Pauline Bonaparte.

This DLC contains 5 new stage with high difficulty,and you can find them at salon after you clear all Main Quests.
data.about_the_game:
As the riot in Paris came to the end,People wants to know the truth behind that series of things.Our brave journalist Miss Elisa decide to take a risk to solve the mysteries around Pauline Bonaparte.

This DLC contains 5 new stage with high difficulty,and you can find them at salon after you clear all Main Quests.
data.short_description: Banner of the Maid is a turn-base strategy game set in the time of the French Revolution. You will lead the army to break through the difficulties and experience the different stories of that most uncommon time with wine of salon and the smoke of battlefield.

fullgame.name: 圣女战旗 Banner of the Maid

data.supported_languages:
Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.0 GHz or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support 1280 x 720 or higher resolution, 512MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support 1280 x 720 or higher resolution, 512MB or above
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

data.legal_notice: Developed by Azure Flame Studio. Published by CE-Asia Hong Kong Limited. CE-Asia, Banner of the Maid and the CE-Asia and Banner of the Maid logos are trademarks and/or registered trademarks. All rights reserved.
